LanguageData.DesignatorCapturePawnDesc: Capture chosen pawn to make him a prisoner. Your colonists assigned to this work will automatically bring pawn to prisoners bed. Works same as right clicking to capture.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateDownedForeignPawn: Pawns must be downed and not be of your faction.
LanguageData.DesignatorCapturePawn_CE: Do CE Stabilize and Capture downed pawn
LanguageData.DesignatorCapturePawnDesc_CE: Capture chosen pawn to make him a prisoner. Your colonists assigned to this work will try Stabilize them and automatically bring pawn to prisoners bed. Works same as right clicking to capture.
LanguageData.DesignatorCapturePawn_FirstAid: Do FirstAid and Capture downed pawn
LanguageData.DesignatorCapturePawnDesc_FirstAid: Capture chosen pawn to make him a prisoner. Your colonists assigned to this work will try do FirstAid and automatically bring pawn to prisoners bed. Works same as right clicking to capture.
